00075 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEALLNAMES 1
00076 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_HAVEWHOLIST (1 << 2)
00077 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_DEADCHAN (1 << 3)
00078 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTWHOREQUEST (1 << 4)
00079 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTPART (1 << 5)
00080 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SYNCHRONIZED (1 << 6)
00081 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_NOCLOSEONPART (1 << 7)
00082 #define KVI_CHANNEL_STATE_SENTSYNCWHOREQUEST (1 << 8)

00122 typedef struct _KviChannelAction
00123 {
00124         QString      szNick;       // action source nick
00125         unsigned int uActionType;  // type of the action
00126         kvi_time_t   tTime;        // time of the action
00127         int          iTemperature; // temperature of the action
00128 } KviChannelAction;

00135 typedef struct _KviChannelActivityStats
00136 {
00137         unsigned int        uActionCount;              // number of actions in the history
00138         bool                bStatsInaccurate;          // the stats are inaccurate because we have just joined the chan
00139         unsigned int        uLastActionTimeSpan;       // the timespan between the last action and now
00140         unsigned int        uFirstActionTimeSpan;      // the time span between the first and the last action
00141         double              dActionsPerMinute;         // average number of actions per minute in the lastActionTimeSpan
00142         unsigned int        uActionsInTheLastMinute;   // number of actions in the last minute
00143         int                 iAverageActionTemperature; // the average chan temperature
00144         unsigned int        uHotActionCount;
00145         unsigned int        uHotActionPercent;
00146         QStringList         lTalkingUsers;             // users that seem to be talking NOW
00147         QStringList         lWereTalkingUsers;
00148 } KviChannelActivityStats;
